name: Mystical Worlds - Prototype
description:
Mystical Worlds is my small VR Game that contains 3 worlds

Forest - 3 Locations + middle forest area

Desert - 2 Locations

Snow Hills - 2 Locations

This might not be much, but I want to get opinions on the project. 

Are maps good or not etc. (Please leave comment down below with your opinion)

I hope you enjoy this prototype

Download is free.
